All Classes

Class Description
AckPacket  
Action
Actions are messages generated by the client to communicate to the server.
ActionFactory
Class used to create the correct action in response to a given operation
ActionHandler
This class is the only one capable of performing an action.
ActivePanel
Panel currently showing in Frame
AlreadyOccupiedException
Exception used when the card is already occupied
AlreadySetException
Exception used when the card is already occupied
Apollo
APOLLO: Your Worker may move into an opponent Workerâ€™s space by forcing their Worker to the space just vacated.
App  
Ares
End of Your Turn: You may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker
Artemis
Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.
Athena
Opponentâ€™s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.
AthenaTurn
Type of Turn used when one of the players uses Athena
Atlas
Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.
BasicTurn
Type of Turn to be used after setup is finished
BlockLevel
BlockLevel represent the lever of a tower, if the level is GROUND the tower has not been built
BoardPanel
Panel containing the board and its functionality
BuildGameAction
action used to perform a build operation
Charon
Before your Worker moves, you may force a neighboring opponent Worker to the space directly on the other side of your Worker, if that space is unoccupied.
ChooseGodPanel
panel displayed when the user has to select one or more god cards from a list of available gods
ChooseNicknamePanel
Panel used when the user connects to the server and has to enter his nickname
ChooseOptions
ChooseOptions are instantiated when the player has to make a decision during the turn, due to the power of his chosen God.
CLI
command-line interface
ClientConnection  
Color
color of the players' workers
ConfirmGameAction
Used by classes God when the user has to answer a question that changes the flow of the player's turn
ConnectionClosedPanel
Panel displayed when the connection with server is closed
Controller
client-side controller
Demeter
Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.
DomeAlreadyPresentException  
GameAction
Actions are messages generated by the client to make a change to the model, such as moving a worker or building a block.
GameController
class that changes the game state
GameOverPanel
panel displayed when the game ends, notifies user if he has won or lost
GamePanel
Panel shown to the user after god selection, it is used when the players place their workers and remains active until the game ends.
GameState
The GameState is the core of the model, from this class you can reach every class of the model.
God  
GodDescription
Contains name and description of god classes
GodOptions
These type of Options are sent to the user in setup, when they have to choose between a set of Gods.
GodsFactory
GodsFactory implement a singleton pattern for each God in game.
GUI
graphical-user interface, this class controls all the panels shown to the user, and notifies client-side controller when the user performs some operation
Hephaestus
Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.
Hestia
Your Worker may build one additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space.
IndexTileGameAction
Many action are just the choice of a tile, therefore all these actions extend this abstract class
IslandBoard
IslandBoard models the game board.
Lobby
The lobby contains the reference to all the objects needed to play a game.
LobbySizeAction
This is an setup action used when a user has to choose the size of the new lobby to which it will be added.
Medusa
If possible, your Workers build in lower neighboring spaces that are "occupied by opponent Workers, removing the opponent Workers from the game.
MessageOption
Option used to notify user with a text message, this option does not expect any response from the user
MessageParser
class used to parse strings coming from user interaction and convert them to the corresponding object, that will be sent with an Action to the server
MessageType  
Minotaur
Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Workerâ€™s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.
MoveGameAction
action used to perform a move operation
NotifyPlayerGod
Option used to tell users their chosen god
Observable<T>  
Observer<T>  
Operation
Operation that a player can perform during his turn
Options
Options are sent by the server to every client, the user identified by the variable nickname is the one that has to perform some operation indicated by the Options object.
Pan
PAN: YOU ALSO WIN IF YOUR WORKER MOVES DOWN TWO OR MORE LEVELS
PlaceWorkerActions
action used to place workers on the board during game setup
PlaceWorkersOptions
Options used in setup phase when users have to place their workers in the game board
Player  
Poseidon
If your unmoved Worker is on the ground level, it may build up to three times.
PoseidonBuildGameAction
action used to perform a build operation when the player owns Poseidon
PoseidonTileOptions
Options used when the user wants to perform a build operation using Poseidon's power
Prometheus
Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
RemoteView
Communication between the controller and clients takes place via this class.
RemoveBlock
action used when player uses power of Ares, that removes a block on the selected tile
SelectGodTurnAction
action used during game setup when players are choosing their god
SelectLobbySizePanel
panel displayed to the first user to enter a lobby.
SelectNicknameAction
action used before the game starts to let users select their nickname
SelectOpponentWorkerGameAction
action used when player uses Charon power
SelectWorkerGameAction
action used to let players choose their worker for the current turn
Server
The Server class manages the server-side network infrastructure, accepting new connections.
SetupActionHandler  
SetupGodsTurn
turn used when players have to choose their god card
SetupOptions
we use it in case of setting both lobby size and nickname of the user.
SetupTurn
turn used during game setup: when players have to choose their god or they have to place their workers on the board
SetupWorkersTurn
turn used when players have to place their workers in the board
SocketClientConnection
class used to handle connection with server
SocketServerConnection
The SocketServerConnection manages communication via server-side sockets
Start  
Tile
The tile is the fundamental component of the IslandBoard.
Tile.Building
Class used to model the tower.
Tile.IndexTile
Class used to model the index integer pair.
TileOptions
class used when the player has to choose between a set of tiles, for example to select a Tile to build, move or select the worker for his turn.
Turn  
View
View is the user interface, that can be graphical or command-line
WelcomeImg
Panel containing welcome image
WelcomePanel  
WinLooseJFrame  
WinLooseOption
Options used to tell users whether they lost or won the game
Worker
The Worker class represent the checker of the game.
Zeus
"Your Worker may build a block under itself."
